short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge Your Reading: Ask insightful questions about any website or document and get clear, trustworthy answers from Hermes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hermes is the browser extension saving professionals valuable time on research and reading.

Upgrade your research experience:
- Get more than just a summary. Hermes tailors every website to meet your style of learning.
- Ask questions about a website's content for instant answers with citations.
- Compare multiple websites' topics and arguments seamlessly.

Simply install the extension and start using Hermes on any website or document
